snippet: The State Supreme Court has postponed execution dates for four inmates, effectively halting all executions while the courts decide whether current protocols for putting people to death are constitutional.
abstract: Tennessee State Supreme Court postpones execution dates for four inmates, effectively halting all executions until legal challenges to current capital punishment protocols are settled.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court has postponed execution dates for four inmates, effectively halting all executions while the courts decide whether current protocols for putting people to death are constitutional.
